content: it s beginner friendly and it works up easily the long row of ribbing make this a perfect look for a woman or a man change up the width and length with ease and make it small enough for a toddler or large enough for a teenager skill level advanced beginner you should be comfortable with the half_double_crochet stitch the stitches are worked into the third loop which can be challenging for an absolute beginner blue berry by loops and threads soft and shiny yarn 1 skein or 311 yards crochet hook size h 5 0 mm yarn needle scissors this pattern is free on the website you can also find a pdf printable version in the etsy shop https //patternprincessetsy etsy com/listing/1600599693/cozy-and-simple-scarf-beginner-easy
